cast.name: 马特乌什·科希丘凯维奇 Mateusz Kosciukiewicz
拉法尔·扎维鲁查 Rafal Zawierucha

director.name: 托马斯·科内切奇 Tomasz Konecki

introduction: An accidental meeting with a beautiful stranger turns the life of Tomek (Mateusz Kosciukiewicz) - an advertising agency ace - upside down. Instead of signing a lucrative contract, he loses everything overnight: a job, an apartment, a fancy car... Faced with an impossible situation, he moves in with his brother - Janek (Rafal Zawierucha), a recluse and computer scientist who is in love with a florist, Klara (Agnieszka Wiedlocha). freak. Tomek, a seasoned picker, proposes a deal to his brother. She will help him in his love conquests if he finds a phenomenal stranger. A bit of hacker magic and the girl manages to be found. Her name is Ola (Zofia Domalik) and she is getting married in exactly two weeks to the son of the Minister of Justice. There is not much time, but Tomek huo87,com does not hesitate to enter the game. Using all his charm, he sneaks into the favor of the minister (Edyta Olszówka) and makes a deceitful proposal to the woman. She offers to make a film with her brother about the preparations for her son's wedding. But in fact, he has only one goal - to seduce and win Ola's heart. And it won't be easy, because the wedding he was hired at is an event like no other: a feast at the Royal Castle, thousands of guests, including the president, business sharks, celebrities and VIPs, and top bands playing to the chop and fireworks that will light up the whole of Warsaw. Simply the biggest Polish wedding.
